name: Client Dash Status Cake Add on
author: Kyle Maurer

sections.description:
What it does

This plugin brings the amazing uptime reporting power of Status Cake into the WordPress dashboard by integrating with Client Dash.

Requirements

  • An account on Status Cake
  • [Client Dash] (https://wordpress.org/plugins/client-dash) plugin version 1.4 or higher
sections.installation:
Using this plugin is very simple. All you have to do is:

  1. Upload the client-dash-status-cake folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

  3. Go to Settings – >Client Dash in your dashboard and enter your Status Cake test credentials
sections.changelog:
0.2.2

  • Now compatible with version 1.5 of Client Dash

0.2.1

  • Now compatible with version 1.4 of Client Dash

0.2

  • Now option for specifying which test
  • Added checks for valid settings and return relevant message
  • Render all useful information in standard table layout

0.1

  • Initial version
